TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ManagementHostingModel extends System.Enum

Docs.summary:
Defines values that specify the hosting model for the provider.
Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks To learn more about WMI provider hosting models, see the Provider Hosting and Security topic on MSDN online.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel Decoupled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Activates the provider as a decoupled provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel LocalService = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the LocalService account.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel LocalSystem = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the LocalSystem account.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Management.Instrumentation.ManagementHostingModel NetworkService = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Activates the provider in the provider host process that is running under the NetworkService account.
